constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 75 (Friday, April 30, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. DeFAZIO:
H.R. 2918.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 18 (relating to the power to
make all laws necessary and proper for carrying out the
powers vested in Congress)
[Page H2135]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Biotechnology, Horticulture, and Research.

title: Continuous Improvement and Accountability in Organic Standards Act
